review.reviewBody: Delicious! Pizza Hut doesn't deliver here anymore, so I'd forgotten just how good their pizza is! It's -almost- tasty enough to justify the higher cost. The personal pan pepperoni lovers is my go-to, when I order from Pizza Hut. But the cost difference between a full of order from Pizza Hut vs other great chains is just high enough to mean that Pizza Hut  isn't my go-to for pizza overall. Still tasty though 🙂
it was very tasty but seems a lot more over priced than what I'm used to. would probably not get again.
So good, but way to over priced compared to other pizza joints, also is this the only restaurant that charges delivery fees LOL

Since they stopped delivering here a couple of year ago, I'd almost forgotten why I'd been so sad about it. Then I ordered my favorite: personal pepperoni pan pizza, and I remembered. It's sooo good, it even almost justifies the price (xD). But yeah, fresh, hot, delicious. And yes, the cinnabons are awesome!
